lyrics:
11 contributorstomorrow me lyricsverse 1
telephone rings can i come over
its kinda just the way things go since weve been over
i know what you want and i want it too
the problem is whats wrong with its the bigger issue

chorus
tomorrow me aint gonna like the way things go tonight
if i let you in and think that itll be different this time
so maybe we should let yesterday be
cause i gotta live with tomorrow me

verse 2
in morning light ill be the guy
starin down i told ya so for the hundredth time
and youll be okay you always are
and ill be picking up the pieces if we go that far

chorus
cause tomorrow me aint gonna like the way things go tonight
if i let you in and think that itll be different this time
so maybe we should let yesterday be
cause i gotta live with tomorrow me

bridge
i know how its gonna end
just like it always ends
see luke combs liveget tickets as low as 32you might also likechorus
yeah tomorrow me aint gonna like the way things go tonight
if i let you in and think that itll be different this time
so maybe we should let yesterday be
yeah maybe we should let yesterday be
cause i gotta live with tomorrow meembed
